mapper.insert: insert into t_address ( address_code, user_code, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, get_name, phone, betrue, create_time, create_name, is_deleted, version ) values ( #{addressCode}, #{userId}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{address}, #{getName}, #{phone}, 1, now(), #{createName}, #{isDeleted}, 0 )
mapper.select: select a.address_code addressCode, a.user_code userCode, b.dic_code provinceCode, b.dic_name provinceName, c.dic_code cityCode, c.dic_name cityName, d.dic_code areaCode, d.dic_name areaName, a.address address, a.get_name getName, a.phone phone, a.betrue betrue from t_address a LEFT JOIN t_dictionary b on a.province_code = b.dic_code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary c on a.city_code = c.dic_code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary d on a.area_code = d.dic_code where a.user_code = #{userId} and a.is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: update t_address set province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, get_name = #{getName}, phone = #{phone}, betrue = #{betrue}, update_time = now(), update_name = #{updateName}, version = version + 1 where address_code = #{addressCode}
